settings.thresholds_desc: Minimum thresholds for technical quality. Photos below these values get 0 stars.

Settings saved successfully.

settings.exposure_desc: Photos with overexposed/underexposed ratio above this threshold will be downgraded by 1 star

advanced_settings.title: Advanced Settings
advanced_settings.zero_star_thresholds: 0 Star Rating Thresholds (Affects Technical Quality Judgment)
advanced_settings.rating_tab_description: Adjust hardcoded rating thresholds (affects 0-star judgment, -1 star only for no bird)
advanced_settings.output_tab_description: Configure output and logging related settings
advanced_settings.min_confidence_description: Below this value will be rated 0-star (poor technical quality)
advanced_settings.min_sharpness_description: Below this value will be rated 0-star (poor technical quality)
advanced_settings.min_nima_description: Below this value will be rated 0-star (poor technical quality)
advanced_settings.max_brisque_description: Above this value will be rated 0-star (poor technical quality)
advanced_settings.picked_percentage_description: Among 3-star photos, those ranking in top % for both aesthetic and sharpness will be picked
advanced_settings.csv_description: CSV contains detailed rating data for all photos (required for post adjustment feature)
advanced_settings.log_detailed_label: Detailed - Show rating details for each photo
advanced_settings.log_simple_label: Simple - Only show progress and statistics

tooltips.ai_confidence: AI bird detection confidence threshold, photos below this won't be processed
tooltips.sharpness: Photo sharpness threshold, affects 2-star and 3-star ratings
tooltips.nima: NIMA aesthetic score threshold, affects 2-star and 3-star ratings
tooltips.normalization: Sharpness normalization method, affects fairness between large and small birds

help.welcome_title: Welcome to SuperPicky V3.9.4 - AI-Powered Bird Photo Selector
help.step1: Click 'Browse' to select photo directory (supports RAW/JPG)
help.step2: Adjust 3-star and pick flag parameters (optional, defaults recommended)
help.step3: Click 'Start Processing' and wait for AI analysis to complete
help.step4: Import to Lightroom for post-processing and management
help.rule_3_star: â­â­â­ = Both sharpness and aesthetics meet threshold (3 stars)
help.rule_picked: â””â”€ ğŸ† Pick Flag = Top {percentage}% in both aesthetics and sharpness among 3-star photos
help.rule_flying: ğŸŸ¢ Green Label = Flying pose bird (Sharpness Ã—1.2 bonus)
help.rule_focus: ğŸ”´ Red Label = Precise Focus (focus on head) (Sharpness Ã—1.1 bonus)
help.rule_exposure: âš ï¸ Over/Under-exposed = Auto downgrade 1 star
help.burst_info: ğŸ“¸ Burst photos are grouped in burst_xxx/ subdirectories
help.rule_2_star: â­â­ = Either sharpness or aesthetics meets threshold (2 stars)
help.rule_1_star: â­ = Bird detected but below threshold (1 star)
help.rule_0_star: 0 star = Poor technical quality (confidence/aesthetics/sharpness below threshold or both eyes hidden)
help.ready: Ready? Select a directory to begin!
help.tool_2: Bird Identifier: AI bird species recognition (Mac/Win Lightroom plugin)
help.tool_3: Bird Finder: eBird information retrieval tool (Web beta)
help.tool_4: Star Remover: AI Milky Way star removal (Mac Photoshop plugin)
help.tool_5: Tui Portfolio: iOS bird species statistics app
help.tool_6: Travel Diary: AI travel journal writing assistant (iOS)

lightroom_guide.title: Lightroom Classic User Guide - How to View and Use SuperPicky Ratings
lightroom_guide.method1_step1: Open Lightroom Classic â†’ Click 'File' â†’ 'Import Photos and Video'
lightroom_guide.method1_step2: Select processed photo directory â†’ Click 'Import'
lightroom_guide.method1_step3: Photos will automatically have star ratings and pick flags!
lightroom_guide.method2_title: Method 2: Re-read Metadata from Already Imported Photos
lightroom_guide.method2_intro: If photos are already in Lightroom, re-read EXIF ratings:
lightroom_guide.method2_step1: Select all processed photos in Library (Cmd+A / Ctrl+A)
lightroom_guide.method2_step2: Right-click â†’ Select 'Metadata' â†’ 'Read Metadata from Files'
lightroom_guide.method2_step3: Confirm â†’ Star ratings and pick flags will auto-update!
lightroom_guide.filter_method1_step2: Click 'â­â­â­' icon â†’ Show only 3-star photos (excellent)
lightroom_guide.filter_method1_step3: Or click 'â‰¥â­â­' â†’ Show 2-star and above
lightroom_guide.filter_method2_step2: Click 'ğŸ†Pick' flag â†’ Show only picked photos
lightroom_guide.sort_step3_city: â˜‘ City (Head sharpness value - higher is sharper)
lightroom_guide.sort_step4: Click sort by (e.g., click 'City' to sort by sharpness)
lightroom_guide.field_rating: Rating: -1 star (rejected) / 0 star (poor quality) / 1 star / 2 stars / 3 stars (excellent)
lightroom_guide.field_pick: Pick: ğŸ†Picked (top 25% in both aesthetics & sharpness among 3-star) / ğŸš«Rejected (-1 star)
lightroom_guide.field_city: City: Head sharpness value, range 0-2000+, higher is sharper
lightroom_guide.field_state: Province-State: Aesthetic score, range 0-10, higher matches human aesthetics better
lightroom_guide.workflow_step1: Step 1: Filter 3-star + picked photos â†’ These are the best quality
lightroom_guide.workflow_step2: Step 2: Sort by 'City' descending â†’ View sharpest photos
lightroom_guide.bridge_tip: ğŸ’¡ Simplest: Use Bridge to open different star folders (3æ˜Ÿ_ä¼˜é€‰/, 2æ˜Ÿ_è‰¯å¥½/, etc.)
